snippet.title: Cursed Roots - teaser trailer
snippet.description:
Cursed Roots is a modern horror point-and-click adventure game, where danger and dark mysteries await at every corner.
A suspenseful and atmospheric video game where you will need to think and act fast to survive.

Coming soon to Windows, Mac, Linux, Android & iOS!

==============================================
Cursed Roots is a game by MastroBros
- Website: http://www.cursedroots.com/
- Follow us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/CursedRoots
- Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/CursedRoots
- Follow us on IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/cursed-roots

==============================================
Music by Nicolas Gasparini ("Myuu") 
- Website: http://www.thedarkpiano.com/
- YouTube: http://youtube.com/myuuji
